page.title: 02AGRICULTURE OLD STOUR HERD
page.content: Mr Veale's herd is famous.Pigs exported to{Italy}and Japan.Started as a hobby in 1959 he employs 2 men. Herd. 106 breeding sows,11 boars - total over 1000 pigs and piglets mainly{Large Whites. The herd has won many championships and Mr Veal is a judge at important Agricultural shows. The pigs eat 9 tons of feed a week. Value of breeding sows Â£160. Mortality rate of piglets 9.6% (just over half the national average). Gestataion period is 116 days. Pigs do not smell.Solids are collected by Mr Candy of Manor Farm - Todber.
